TITLE: Basic Usage of DockLayout in React DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to import and use the DockLayout component with a default layout configuration. Shows implementation of a simple dock layout with a single tab. SOURCE: https://github.com/ticlo/rc-dock/blob/master/README.md#_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: jsx CODE: ``` import DockLayout from 'rc-dock' import "rc-dock/dist/rc-dock.css"; ... defaultLayout = { dockbox: { mode: 'horizontal', children: [ { tabs: [ {id: 'tab1', title: 'tab1', content:
Hello World
} ] } ] } }; render() { return ( ) } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Saving Layout State in DockLayout DESCRIPTION: Shows the saveLayout API function which allows saving the current state of a DockLayout. Returns a SavedLayout object that can be stored for later use. SOURCE: https://github.com/ticlo/rc-dock/blob/master/README.md#_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: typescript CODE: ``` saveLayout(): SavedLayout ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Loading Layout State in DockLayout DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates the loadLayout API function which loads a previously saved layout state into the DockLayout component. SOURCE: https://github.com/ticlo/rc-dock/blob/master/README.md#_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: typescript CODE: ``` loadLayout(savedLayout: SavedLayout): void ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Moving Elements in DockLayout DESCRIPTION: Shows the dockMove API method that allows programmatically moving tabs or panels within the layout. Supports moving by reference or by ID. SOURCE: https://github.com/ticlo/rc-dock/blob/master/README.md#_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: typescript CODE: ``` dockMove(source: TabData | PanelData, target: string | TabData | PanelData | BoxData, direction: DropDirection): void; ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Finding Elements by ID in DockLayout DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates the find API method for locating PanelData or TabData elements by their unique ID within the layout structure. SOURCE: https://github.com/ticlo/rc-dock/blob/master/README.md#_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: typescript CODE: ``` find(id: string): PanelData | TabData; ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Updating Tab Properties in DockLayout DESCRIPTION: Shows the updateTab API method that allows modifying a tab's properties with new TabData. Returns false if the tab with the specified ID is not found. SOURCE: https://github.com/ticlo/rc-dock/blob/master/README.md#_snippet_5 LANGUAGE: typescript CODE: ``` updateTab(id: string, newTab: TabData): boolean; ```
